metadata.title: CVE-2023-3338 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference flaw was found in the Linux kernel's DECnetnetworking protocol. This issue could allow a remote user to crash thesystem.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
